Title: CagerAutoPilot
Description: Programmatically control a toy helicopter with kinect
HomeWiki:
Cager Auto Pilot

The Goal of the Project is to control a toy helicopter named "Cager" with a PC and a Kinect.

The Project consists of following parts:
- Identify the helicopter in a room
- Track the movement of the helicopter
- Keep the helicopter automatically on a Position
- Programmatically control the helicopter to fly to a certain position
